message: This is just a reminder of tomorrow's meetup. Amir Barylko is joining us to demo using Capybara. Get all the details on our blog at http://yegrb.com/meetups/2011/05/25/MEETUP-June-01-Capybara/
DOH! How could I NOT notice until now that this conflicts with U2.  Man am getting dopey in my old age.
I don't think I'll be able to get to this capybara meeting, way to much yard work to do while it's nice. The next meetup date on yegrb is wrong :D "Our next meetup is May 17th, 2011".
lol, good catch Ryan. Still getting used to the new site! I'll have to update that.
